structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.text: [ Text of section effective until July 1, 2011. Repealed by 2011, 68, Sec. 114. See 2011, 68, Sec. 221.] Said divisions shall be assigned to represent persons charged in the district court department with concurrent felonies under section twenty-six of chapter two hundred and eighteen as further defined by the committee.
